citations.desc: NOTIFICATION OF CHANGE OF NAME, ADDRESS, CONTROL, OR OWNERSHIP OF BUSINESS.
citations.narrative:
THE LICENSEE SHALL PROMPTLY NOTIFY THE USDA ANIMAL CARE REGIONAL OFFICE, IN WRITING,
WITHIN 10 DAYS OF A CHANG IN ADDRESS. THE LICENSEE NO LONGER IS AT THE CURRENT ADDRESS
AND HAS NOT NOTIFIED ANIMAL CARE OF ANY CHANGE.
CORRECT BY: MARCH 1, 2014

citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
Section 2.126(b) - Access and inspection of records and property: A responsible adult shall be made available to
accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:45PM on
02/14/2014.
END OF REPORT.

narrative:
2.8(h)
NOTIFICATION OF CHANGE OF NAME, ADDRESS, CONTROL, OR OWNERSHIP OF BUSINESS.
THE LICENSEE SHALL PROMPTLY NOTIFY THE USDA ANIMAL CARE REGIONAL OFFICE, IN WRITING,
WITHIN 10 DAYS OF A CHANG IN ADDRESS.  THE LICENSEE NO LONGER IS AT THE CURRENT ADDRESS
AND HAS NOT NOTIFIED ANIMAL CARE OF ANY CHANGE.
CORRECT BY:  MARCH 1, 2014
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
Section 2.126(b) - Access and inspection of records and property: A responsible adult shall be made available to
accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:45PM on
02/14/2014.
END OF REPORT.
